Reviews.Title: NOT NEW!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Alexandra Montiel
Reviews.Content: Nowhere on this product description it says that this item is NEW, yet they make you believe it is. Don't be fooled!! this cell phone is not new. It looks different from the original official white blackberry phone.. this phone came with black headsets and black case, when the white phone usually comes with a white case. Also, there are parts of the phone that look like they're not new, including the screen. Also, there was music and apps installed on the phone, as well. Don't be fooled.

Reviews.Title: What a fiasco!
Reviews.Author: Fernanda
Reviews.Content: You would think that a white phone picture means a white phone!!! I ordered just on time to receive the phone and travel with it as a gift and I received a Black phone instead!!  I want my white phone! Who knows how long is gonna take to exchange it!

Reviews.Title: I received an refurbished phone (Not New)
Reviews.Author: Luis Chang
Reviews.Content: I will Never deal again with this seller.I buy a new phone but really I received a refurbished phone.Please don't deal with this seller *%$&(@!

Reviews.Title: Not Recommended.
Reviews.Author: Farah
Reviews.Content: The first problem I had with this product was the colour of the case, I ordered in white and it came with a black back case. This item was sent as a gift to a person outside USA, so when it get to its destination, the cellphone didn't work. At first, the product started normally, but in a couple of hours it turn off and never worked again.I wish we could try to get to an agreement, but I'm really upset about the purchase I've done.

Reviews.Title: defrauds
Reviews.Author: Maribel
Reviews.Content: this telefhone es good, but It did not bring the memory card that they say Then it is one defrauds....

Reviews.Title: a nightmare
Reviews.Author: shamore
Reviews.Content: i have had nothing but stress with this phone from day one...i have had to send it back twice already for repairs and i have only had it a few months.  i dont think its the model so much as it is the seller they clearly carry an inferior product

Reviews.Title: Don't bother buying from this company!
Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: I first reciveed this phone & was so excited! I turned it on & started using it right awau, I noticed that the keys would get stuck & type something like "johhhhnnnnyy" instead of just "johnny" so as soon as I realized it wasn't me that was doing it, I e-mailed the company & asked them if I could send the phone back to get it fixed but I let them know I had cracked it & they said then there would be a small fee but that they would be able to do it. I pay the $20 to ship out my phone & once it gets over there the manager messages me stating that he cannot fix the phone because of the crack. Once I asked him to reimburse me the $$ for sending it & he saw the reciept, I guess he realized it was just cheaper to go ahead & fix it. He gave me a new housing so the crack I made was gone, but my keyboard is still messed up!!!! Don't bother with these "Blackberrypdasmartphone" company!! Go somewhere else, this phone was just refurbished! not New at all!!

Reviews.Title: Great! Exactly what I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: Robson Freitas
Reviews.Content: That was I perfect to me. Corresponds for all my needs in just one device: GPS, more memory space, good cam, bluetooh, smooth keyboard, great style (white). I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: negativo
Reviews.Author: Ronald
Reviews.Content: no estoy conforme me vino el cargado dañado no me trago el audifano no me vino el cd y no es nuevo

Reviews.Title: WoW
Reviews.Author: Chow
Reviews.Content: OMG! This phone is AMAZING! I got SO many compliments on it!!I bought it from this seller AzrakMohitWadi.. VERY nice people. Got the phone Instantly in a few days.The phone itself has so many features. And I can't stop talking about how amazing it is.. OMG Yay!

Reviews.Title: Product with problems.
Reviews.Author: Wellington Remigio
Reviews.Content: Good evening, ladies and gentlemen comuico you buy that product and after a while it started to give me problems and now I find that it is assembled, it is original and is cloned, please ask your help to solve this problemRegards,

Reviews.Title: Totally Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Elliot Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I have ordered 2 phones, 1 for me and 1 for my wife:My phone:1. I had to charge the battery every 8 hours even without using the phone.2. I received another battery but it did not work out. It was worst because this time the battery died after 3 hours of being charged (Without using the phone).3. Lastly, I had problems with the battery charger as it became too loose and I had to tape it onto the phone to keep it tight enough so I could charge the battery.My wife's phone: The first 2 weeks It was fine, but suddenly the screen started leaking and a large dark patch was shown on the screen. Additionally, she was not able to type a message or write anything because the typing keys were too loose.I have returned my phone today and I will return my wife's within a couple of months as she is out of the Country. I am requesting a full refund plus shipping cost.Thanks,Elliot Hernandez

Reviews.Title: is black color !!
Reviews.Author: ali alshehri
Reviews.Content: I received a phone in Saudi Arabia is black color !! I have asked white  color, why this error????please help me AmazoneAli Alshehriaburenad@gmail.com

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: Jose Poleo
Reviews.Content: PRODUCTO ES EXCELENTE LO RECOMIENDO AMPLIAMENTE GRACIAS POR SUS SERVICIOS Y LES DESEO LO MEJOR EN SUS VENTAS SIEMPRE GRACIAS

Reviews.Title: RECIBIDO
Reviews.Author: Adelis Alvarado
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE VENDEDOR REALIZARE MAS COMPRAS EN EL FUTURO, QUEDE SATISFECHO CON EL PRODUCTO Y HARE RECOMENDACIONES A TODOS LOS AMIGOS

Reviews.Title: Phone did not work!
Reviews.Author: oussama mellouli
Reviews.Content: The phone is completely defective. It wont work. Wont turn on. And when I get it to turn on it won't detect any carrier. Shady deal.

Reviews.Title: Love my Bold 9700!
Reviews.Author: Citprof
Reviews.Content: I'm sorry folks are having problems with the Vendor.  I've used my BlackBerry Bold 9700 for two years & love, love, love it!  I want to switch back to AT&T; so was researching if it was compatible & that's why I ran into these reviews.  All sorts of deals for me to get a new phone, but for my life:  phone calls & 5 email accounts, camera, Texas Hold-em Poker, this is the best phone.  It's small and solid.  I can slip it into my pocket & not worry about it.  I had some minor problems with it, but think that's due to my service provider.

Reviews.Title: entregado
Reviews.Author: luciano
Reviews.Content: hola , recibi el telefono en exelentes condiciones , en forma y tiempo ademas con respuestas instantaneas y rapidas del vendedor muchas gracias, recomendado

Reviews.Title: Cell was refurbished and not new
Reviews.Author: Lu Car "Cindy"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone as a new phone. when I received it I could not hear anyone calling me or noone could hear me. I took it to my service provider and was told it is not a new phone but refurbished and that the speakers contained water. It was dried out and then it went off completely and would not turn on. It is now coming on and going back off at intervals. Phone is basically no good and I aim to return it.

Reviews.Title: I bought a new phone and received a refurbished phone
Reviews.Author: Lirio Falcon
Reviews.Content: I bought a new equipment with new equipment price and received a refurbished phone. I need a new equipment and to return this old phone. Worst of all it stated (New) in the product description. So how should I have known that this was an used equipment? Not so much used but reconstructed. I am very dissapointed and I need an answer for this uncomfortable situation.

Reviews.Title: a tiempo
Reviews.Author: hiliana
Reviews.Content: llego en muy buen estado el teléfono es super practico compatible con cualquier linea gsm soy de venezuela y funciono muy bien  y la entrega fue en el tiempo estimado. muy buenos vendedores

Reviews.Title: great phone.
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. Met all of my expectations. Must say its a good phone. Slim, sleek and affordable. Haven't found any faults as yet.

Reviews.Title: Bar phone
Reviews.Author: Cesar
Reviews.Content: Dear, this phone is damage. Its screen is on blank. I am losing reliability with my clients. I expect you consideration with this matter

Reviews.Title: all a fraud. READ BEFORE BIDDING.
Reviews.Author: sayu sifontes
Reviews.Content: ENGLISH COMMENT: the phone really is not new, the charger does not work, did not send the memory card that offers you article. visibly shows that it is rebuilt. I'm very upset ... not send the phone because I am in Venezuela and more is what I will pay the shipping cost of the phone in Venezuela .... Not recommended in any way ... Unfortunately I read the reviews before bidding. and if you read the comments for this seller will realize that they are all negative...COMENTARIO EN ESPAÑOL: realmente el telefono no es nuevo, el cargador no funciona, no enviaron la tarjeta de memoria que ofrece le articulo. visiblemente se observa que es reconstruido. estoy sumamente molesta... no envio el telefono porque estoy en Venezuela y mas es lo que voy a pagar en envio que el costo del mismo telefono en Venezuela.... No lo recomiendo de ninguna manera...Lamentablemente lei los comentarios antes de ofertar. y si leen los comentarios de este vendedor se daran cuenta que todas son negativas...

Reviews.Title: incomplete package
Reviews.Author: yemmy
Reviews.Content: i purchased this item because it was supposed to be a complete package. the item description stated that the box contains a headset, a pouch and 2g memory card which was not in d box when i got it. i would expect to receive these accesories or be left with no choice than to return the phone. meanwhile there should be a contact for the seller.

Reviews.Title: im dissapointed
Reviews.Author: sexy liz
Reviews.Content: i regreted purchaseing this item because its a used product n i paid 253 for it n its already giving trouble blanking off n thing i carried it to check it out n dey opened the product infront of me n it was dig up n stratch up n i wud like to get my phone change or refund my money so please please people dont buy dis item its faulty n its used so dont buy it !!!!!! its not wat u expect it looks brand new on d outside n wen ur open it up it dig up n battered n i spent over 1000 us dollars on dis site n dey did me dat still

Reviews.Title: The blackberrry has a problem
Reviews.Author: K. Ordaz "kordaz"
Reviews.Content: The blackberrry has a problem. The battery signal does not change color to alert it is this ending. I apply to the guarantee? must do for the replacement of the appliance?

Reviews.Title: informations
Reviews.Author: Zureima Guerra
Reviews.Content: vivo en venezuela y quiero saber si este equipo esta liberado para cualquier operadora de mi pais (movilnet, movistar y digitel) ? o para una en especifica? gracias

Reviews.Title: blackberry bold  nice color  but no browser
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Phone was as advertised. Works fine. Only complaint was that is didn't have an internet browser installed. But I installed from bb site. Working fine now

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: panasonic es8228s men,s
Reviews.Content: This phone is excellent and specifications sweet and open in Saudi Arabia and some places have been purchased instead of this gift and fit for those who love and thanks
